events.message: I just received my order and the tablet screen has a large scratch on it. It's very disappointing to see a damaged product right out of the box.
The customer's complaint has been categorized under Product Defect due to the scratched screen reported.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah L. for further handling of the product defect report.
Hello! I'm Sarah from support. I'm sorry to hear about the scratch on your tablet screen. Let's get this sorted out for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and the packaging so we can assess the damage and proceed with the best solution?
I have attached several clear photos showing the scratch on the screen and the intact packaging box as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can either send you a replacement tablet or offer a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to receive a replacement if possible, since I still want to use the tablet but need one without defects.
A replacement tablet has been arranged and will be shipped to your address within the next 3 business days. We will send you tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your replacement tablet and that it is in perfect condition. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Since the replacement was successfully delivered and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
